beschädigen. Am Ende des Unterrichts räumen wir unseren Platz auf, sodass der Klassenraum sauber bleibt.

We do not run in the classroom or in the hallway. We always move quietly and deliberately
to avoid accidents. We do not use the climbing frame and the turning spider in the schoolyard when they are wet,
so that no one slips and hurts themselves. We also do not play with the ball in rainy weather. We do not
push anyone and we definitely do not hit anyone. We always resolve disputes without physical violence. Everyone handles
their own school belongings responsibly and takes care not to damage
those of others. At the end of the lesson, we tidy up our space so that the classroom stays clean.
During the lesson, we only speak when we have raised our hand and the teacher calls on us. No one
just gets up or walks around during the lesson unless the teacher allows it. Cell phones and other
electronic devices remain switched off and in the school bag. We also adhere to the agreements in group lessons
so that everyone can work well. When we make mistakes, we don't laugh at each other,
